entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:41 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the afternoon then light later in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:41 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
